name: Paulinho da Viola
description: '''Paulinho da Viola''' (born '''Paulo César Batista de Faria''' on 12 November 1942) ({{IPA|pt|pawˈlĩɲu da viˈɔlɐ}}) is a Brazilian ''[[samba|sambista]]'', singer-songwriter, [[Classical guitar|guitar]], [[cavaquinho]] and [[mandolin]] player, known for his sophisticated harmonies and soft, gentle singing voice.
